title: Those "trinket" things
body:
I think it's time to get real about what's happening in the Jungle. 

Riot has given us this beautiful thing... it's a trinket.  It's free. It's vision... It's bae. 
{{item:3340}} 
**BUT WAIT THERE'S MORE!! **
For some spare change  **_YOU_**  can upgrade your trinketbae to an even BETTER trinketbae.
{{item:3361}} {{item:3362}} 
3 wards for 250 gold? Pshhhhhhhh.
NO THIS ISN'T A SCAM! IT'S REAL! AND IT COULD BE YOURS!

_**BUT WAIT THERE'S EVEN MORE**_
Trinketbae can be purchased in several different flavors! 
{{item:3363}} {{item:3364}} 
_________________________________
But for real. Can we make warding the new meta?

replies.body: {{item:3361}} is love
{{item:3361}}  is life
burn the {{item:3361}} {{item:3362}}
This is my go to, I need to b but I only have 250g.
should be your go to "I need to b, better get some trinket upgrades.  Upgrades for win. Upgrades 4 lyfe
{{item:3361}}  is bae

> [{quoted}](name=MacDthree,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=IbUFJb8g,comment-id=,timestamp=2015-05-05T15:13:12.988+0000)
>
> But for real. Can we make warding the new meta?

Do you even Season 1, bruh?

(for real though, <3)

the world where there wasn't a ward cap. 
Oh god I'm still laughing.
Ah yes. Lighting the jungle up like a Christmas Tree

Living in a land of support poverty. 

Thus they truly were the glory days. I think.

Pre-rework {{champion:16}} with {{item:2044}} {{item:2044}} {{item:2044}} {{item:2044}} {{item:2044}} {{item:2044}} 

Down to the memory lane we go~
For real though, didn't play season 1 but played season 2 and riddick Could have starred in that shit.

I always upgrade between 9-11 depending on gold and how close I am to items. I love that little ward factory that takes up zero item slots and provides a metric shit ton of wards for the low, low cost of 250g.

"little ward factory" 
perf.
Damn I didn't even know there was such thing as "upgrading trinkets"... This is AMAZING, thanks for the info!
This post gives me HOPE
Easily my most favorite upgrade in the game...and I main Viktor!
Its like a mini sightstone that doesn't take up an inventory slot, why wouldn't you upgrade this as soon as you hit level 9?
Because "gg support no sightstone".
Trinketbae (͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)
I tried to start saying #upurtrinks in my games, but then people just flamed me for using "those dumb pound sign things"

As a jungle main I agree. People lack vision control at my low elo. (Although I'm sure exactly what that is seeing as I don't play ranked but get matched from everything to Bronze to low Diamond in normals). My team often has little vision, the only person really warding being the support and myself if I have inventory space.

Laners are self entitled twats half the time, and they expect the support to just prance around warding their lane for them. Because 75 gold or your *free trinket* is just way too much.

#TrinketBae2k15

can we make TrinketBae2K15 a thing?
i require an Instagram account and t-shirts stat.

I love playing Veigar, Karthus, etc. mid and upgrading my trinket to keep myself safe early, and then just deep ward enemy jungle later game.

Particularly as {{champion:45}} since the longer I'm in lane, the more AP I'm stacking and the more HP I can afford to put into my build for survivability in teamfights

once you hit level 9*

as a support this makes me cry because I cant updgrade to pinky until im level 9 ;-;

just buy regular pinks before then, lol xD 

but yeah I'm always like *goestobuytrinketupgraede  -> "NOOOOOO IMONLYLVL7"
http://i3.kym-cdn.com/photos/images/newsfeed/000/678/588/821.gif

Fun fact

"Bae" is Danish for "poop"

So I'm getting some mixed messages here.

trinketpoop works as well. 

Although I was moreso going for the Americanized white girl wasted phrase 'Bae' which I guess means something along the lines of babe. or something.
sounded good.

B)efore
A)nyone/Anybody 
E)lse

Source: My wife.
If they remove the cooldown when upgrading from {{item:3340}} to {{item:3361}}. Than yes

I can't even count how many times I have said this, both in boards and in game. People don't want to for some reason and fight it at every turn :P. Support and jungle can't cover the entire map in wards with only three each and a vision that usually gets killed right away. Wish more people would use those dang things and upgrade them

Because giving up gold to help the team is for slaves, also known as supports.

It's a toxic attitude, but the mechanic of paying one person's gold to gain vision for everyone encourages it.  Because if you get someone else to pay *their* gold instead of paying yours, then you're stronger and can convince yourself that you're "carrying".

People don't even upgrade when they have gold to spare at the end is the worst part. I have had so many games where I ask people who are already fully-built to upgrade and they still refuse. it's just like, "gee oh what oh what am i gonna do with this 3k gold. I KNOW! I'll buy all the{{item:2140}} {{item:2139}} {{item:2137}} or {{item:2138}} I can buy". Seriously though, why sit there with 3k gold, buy one elixir and not upgrade it at that point?
What's a ward?

If they made it possible to buy the upgrade at, say, 5 or 6 it'd be okay.
250 gold is quite a bit to be using at that point in the game, but a lot of supports would benefit more from it than spending 800 in a sightstone. In fact, I think it should be available from the start, so on first back the support can upgrade it and buy the rest of their support item. 
As far as other roles go, it's still a lot to spend but could be worth it.
Frankly, all the important ganks happen before level 9. And map awareness is cool and all but having the ward upgrade unavailable when it's needed early is a bit dumb.
And everyone knows blue rassberry bae is gross.

BLUE
RASBERRY
BAE 
IS GROSS

it really isn't that much to spend.  It's a few waves of farm for 3 more wards for the team.  You doing a  tiny bit of extra damage 4 minutes earlier isn't going to help you against the 4 man gank squad that came cruising undetected to your lane

not to mention, assuming you buy 4 regular wards all game, or 2 regular wards and 1 pink, you're already at cost. 
so
Wow, that's amazing! How does one use this "trinketbae?"
As a support, I heart my {{item:3364}} . Oh I see you, enemy support, only one warding. I _see you..._
I need level 9 bad... I need it now!
I can't tell you how often I have to beg my teammates to buy their upgraded trinkets. Usually they still don't get them until like 30 min mark right before game ends...

it drives me a bit crazy.
because buying 2 regular wards and 1 pink is the same price.  and almost everybody does that in the length of a game anyway, and that only buys you 3 wards.  For literally the same price you can get 3 recycling wards all game long.  Then people want to rage at lvl 12 because their lane got 3 man ganked. I'm always just like O.o. wards?? For free? plz.

> [{quoted}](name=MacDthree,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=IbUFJb8g,comment-id=00130000,timestamp=2015-05-06T18:28:50.904+0000)
>
> and almost everybody does that in the length of a game anyway

I see you are overestimating a large chunk of LOL's player-base.
i was being hopeful. ;_;
